metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17459 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect handling of clicks in the omnibox in Navigation in Google Chrome prior to 69.0.3497.92 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17459` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
